titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7702

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, September 12th 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State
Sir
Major George W. Rue's Commission which is dated August 13, 1862 is cancelled --

Commission issued to Edward Davis vice Ed Hughes 2d. Lieut: & dated Sep. 12, 1862.
Do E. O. Brown Surg dated " " "
Do Frank H. Pope adjt. dated Aug 18, "
Do Rector W. Gist Qr. Mas " " " "
Do Edwin J. Clarke Commisary " " " "
Do Rector W. Gist 2 Lieut -- " " 15 "
Do Wm A. Craig " -- " -- " " " "
Do Lewis Owen -- " -- " -- " " 18 "
Do J. D. Hale -- " -- " -- " " -- " -- " --
Do M B. Gratz 1 -- " -- " Sep 12 -- " --
Do Charles L Burleigh 2 -- " -- " -- "Â " -- " --

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken Vols
